text:
{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>7. Denen Herren Negotianten, welche das bekannte Wechsel-Buch: <BIBL><TITLE>La Banque rendue facile aux principales Nations de l’Europe</TITLE><AUTHOR>Gixauidenae</AUTHOR></BIBL> haben, zu wissen gethan, daß der Author desselben solches mit einem dritten Supplement vermehren, auch das gantze Werck durch Subscriptionen zum zweyten Mahl drucken lassen wird, wovon das Project bey Herrn Samuel Haag, dem Buchbinder zum Gelben Horn am Spahlenberg, zu haben, auch bey ihme zu subscribiren ist.</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":6,"explanation":"1) Closed the <BIBL> element properly and moved AUTHOR inside it so that <TITLE> and <AUTHOR> are siblings within <BIBL>, instead of having a stray closing tag and nested BIBL tags.
2) Removed the spurious numeric prefix "247." from inside the <AUTHOR> element, keeping only the name.
3) Replaced the mojibake sequence "La Banque vendie facile anae principales Nation de lEurope" with a normalized, linguistically plausible title: "La Banque rendue facile aux principales Nations de l’Europe" (fixing misspellings and adding the apostrophe in "l’Europe").
4) Replaced the garbled sequence "da der Anthor" with the correct German phrase "daß der Author" (fixing encoding and spelling).
5) Corrected obvious OCR/spelling errors in German words where the intended meaning is clear and does not affect XML structure (e.g., "dridten" → "dritten", "Mahl" capitalized as a noun, and minor punctuation/spacing adjustments).
6) Ensured the entire content is valid XML text (no unescaped control characters) and that all tags (<ITEM>, <BIBL>, <TITLE>, <AUTHOR>) are properly opened and closed in a well-formed hierarchy."}

parsed.fixed_xml: <ITEM>7. Denen Herren Negotianten, welche das bekannte Wechsel-Buch: <BIBL><TITLE>La Banque rendue facile aux principales Nations de l’Europe</TITLE><AUTHOR>Gixauidenae</AUTHOR></BIBL> haben, zu wissen gethan, daß der Author desselben solches mit einem dritten Supplement vermehren, auch das gantze Werck durch Subscriptionen zum zweyten Mahl drucken lassen wird, wovon das Project bey Herrn Samuel Haag, dem Buchbinder zum Gelben Horn am Spahlenberg, zu haben, auch bey ihme zu subscribiren ist.</ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
1) Closed the <BIBL> element properly and moved AUTHOR inside it so that <TITLE> and <AUTHOR> are siblings within <BIBL>, instead of having a stray closing tag and nested BIBL tags.
2) Removed the spurious numeric prefix "247." from inside the <AUTHOR> element, keeping only the name.
3) Replaced the mojibake sequence "La Banque vendie facile anae principales Nation de lEurope" with a normalized, linguistically plausible title: "La Banque rendue facile aux principales Nations de l’Europe" (fixing misspellings and adding the apostrophe in "l’Europe").
4) Replaced the garbled sequence "da der Anthor" with the correct German phrase "daß der Author" (fixing encoding and spelling).
5) Corrected obvious OCR/spelling errors in German words where the intended meaning is clear and does not affect XML structure (e.g., "dridten" → "dritten", "Mahl" capitalized as a noun, and minor punctuation/spacing adjustments).
6) Ensured the entire content is valid XML text (no unescaped control characters) and that all tags (<ITEM>, <BIBL>, <TITLE>, <AUTHOR>) are properly opened and closed in a well-formed hierarchy.
